QuestData.Title: Lost in the Desiccation
QuestData.Description:
<Exposure to the Light has rendered Theotar incapable of forming coherent sentences.
Instead of telling you how to get to his hideout, he mumbles incoherently while pointing in random directions.>
Lost... Syb... Tubbins... Late for tea...
<You'll have to find Theotar's hideout a different way.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Discover the way to Theotar's hideout.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Gubbins and Tubbins in the Mad Duke's Parlor.
QuestData.RewardText:
<Gubbins and Tubbins speak in unison.>
Dis not good.
